original_text: And when the voice of the trumpet sounded long, and waxed louder and louder, Moses spake, and God answered him by a voice.
korean_text: 나팔 소리가 점점 커질 때에 모세가 말한즉 하나님이 음성으로 대답하시더라

sentences.original_text: And when the voice of the trumpet sounded long
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나팔 소리가 길게 울릴 때

sentences.original_text: and God answered him by a voice
